mapper.select: select a.ID, a.NAME, a.parentid, a.icon, IFNULL(b.Name, '-') as parentname from menu a left join menu b on a.parentId = b.id where a.parentid = #{id} and a.isused = 1 order by a.index

select a.path, a.icon, a.code, a.nocache, a.id, a.name, a.url, a.parentid, #{userId} userId from menu a left join rolemenurelation b on a.id = b.menuid left join role c on b.roleid = c.id where c.id = #{userId} and a.parentid = '0' and a.isused = 1 GROUP BY a.path, a.id, a.name, a.url, a.parentid, a.nocache, a.code, a.icon order by a.index

select a.path, a.icon, a.code, a.nocache, a.id, a.name, a.url, a.parentid, #{userId} userId from menu a left join rolemenurelation b on a.id = b.menuid left join role c on b.roleid = c.id where c.id = #{userId} and a.parentid = #{id} and a.isused = '1' GROUP BY a.path, a.id, a.name, a.url, a.parentid, a.nocache, a.code, a.icon order by a.index

select distinct b.id, b.name from rolemenurelation a left join menu b on a.menuid = b.id and a.menuid not in (select distinct m2.id from menu m1 inner join menu m2 where m1.parentid = m2.id) where roleid = #{roleid} and b.id is not null
select * from menu a WHERE parentid = '0' ORDER BY a.index
select * from menu a WHERE a.parentid = #{ID} ORDER BY a.index

SELECT a.url, a.id, a.`code`, a.`name`, a.isused, a.parentid, a.icon, a.createtime, a.modifytime, b.`name` AS parentname, a.nocache, a.path, a.component, c.`userName` AS creator, d.`userName` AS modifier FROM menu a LEFT JOIN menu b ON a.parentid = b.id LEFT JOIN `user` c ON a.creatorid = c.id LEFT JOIN `user` d ON a.modifierid = d.id WHERE a.id = #{ID}
mapper.update: update menu set name=#{name}, parentid=#{parentid}, path=#{path}, icon=#{icon}, url=#{url}, isused=#{isused}, nocache=#{noCache}, modifytime=now(), modifierid=#{modifierid} where id = #{id}; select queryParentMenu(#{id});
